facts.fact: Modules have to be explicitly loaded with `:- use_module` in order to be used.

In `:- use_module(Module, []).` Module must be
1. A file path (most common): - `'./types/validation'` → relative path - `'/absolute/path/to/module'` → absolute path - `'module'` → relative to current file's directory
2. A library reference (special case): - `library(lists)` → searches library paths - `library(clpz)` → searches library paths
`:- use_module(Module).` i.e. use_module/1 imports everything that Module exports.
use_module/3 can be used if module name and file differs!
